summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, authorizing signal modernization and new signal installations at 8th Avenue Northeast and Northeast 65th Street, 42nd Avenue Southwest and Southwest Alaska Street, California Avenue Southwest and Southwest Alaska Street, and California Avenue Southwest at Fauntleroy Avenue Southwest and Southwest Morgan Street, making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund therefor, and abandoning a prior appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund made by Ordinance 101426.
